product_name: Screamer Bob's Ragtime Hat - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Earflaps and a fleece lining make the Bob's Ragtime hat from Screamer a great topper in icy, wintry weather. A traditional knit pattern on the outside brightens up cloudy skies. Blend of acrylic and wool fabric insulates while remaining naturally soft and breathable; synthetic fleece lining wicks away moisture from skin so you stay dry and comfortable. Closeout.
short_description: Earflaps and a fleece lining make the Bob's Ragtime hat from Screamer a great topper in icy, wintry weather. A traditional knit pattern on the outside brightens up cloudy skies.
